title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7621.9 - Medical housing units and treatment areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7621.9 - Medical housing units and treatment areas

State Regulations
(a) Each individual occupancy housing unit
used to house inmates apart from general population for purposes of medical
observation or treatment shall have a minimum of 80 square feet of floor
space. (b) Each multiple housing
unit used to house inmates apart from general population for purposes of
medical observation or treatment shall have a minimum of 80 square feet of
floor space per inmate in the sleeping area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7621.9

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
